## ShaderFramework.ftransform() method

Transform vertex position to the clip space and calcuate the world normal and tangent frame if needed

**Signature:**

```typescript
static ftransform(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, billboardMode?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  billboardMode | number | _(Optional)_ If not zero, transform vertex as billboard |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This function handles skin animation and geometry instancing if needed
